# xlsx2html

A simple export from xlsx format to html tables with keep cell formatting


# Install

```bash
pip install xlsx2html
```


# Usage

```python
from xlsx2html import xlsx2html

xlsx2html('path/to/example.xlsx', 'path/to/output.html')
```
